name: css-image-orientation
description: Css module of single purpose classes for image orientation

scripts.start: tachyons src/tachyons-base.css > css/tachyons-base.css && tachyons src/tachyons-base.css --minify > css/tachyons-base.min.css && tachyons src/tachyons-base.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
